subject: Wages and Salaries
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Dodgers ended the Yankees’ 15-year streak as baseball’s biggest spenders with a projected payroll of $235 million. The Yankees are second at $204 million.
snippet: The Los Angeles Dodgers ended the Yankees’ 15-year streak as baseball’s biggest spenders with a projected payroll of $235 million. The Yankees are second at $204 million.
